senses.sense_definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of the Roman historian <w>Tacitus</w>, especially his concise, incisive, and often ironic writing style.

examples.text: The journalist wrote with a <w>Tacitean</w> brevity that conveyed the harsh reality of the war without unnecessary emotion.
His analysis of the political scandal was marked by <w>Tacitean</w> irony and deep skepticism.
